review: I love this product.  Easy to install and works great.  We get much more programing than with our Apple TV's.  We have three of them.
author: Irving Becker "Irv Becker"

review: Second Roku for our kitchen TV.  Easy to use.  Easy to set up.  Took about 15 minutes from opening the box to watching content.  And most of that time was syncing the channels with passwords onto device.  Roku 3 in the living room.  The only difference so far is no headphones and you have to point the remote more precisely.  I don't need those functions for this TV.  We reduced our cable to Starter TV with HBO.  Standard internet and phone.  Reduced our bill by 1/2.  With  Netlix and Amazon and HBO GO we have a lot of good choices.  Other than a couple favorite channels like TCM and MSNBC (Golf Channel for my Husband) we're pretty happy.  Conservatively we're going to save $750 over 12 months.
author: Janet Wise

review: I have a Roku 3 at home ... I miss it when I travel ... now I have a full Roku box in a stick to travel with. When I registered the stick, all my Roku 3 channels immediately initialized on the stick. I'm happy!
